meanings.definition: To bake (something) too long or too much.
meanings.sent1: Mom always overbakes the cookies, making them too hard to eat.
meanings.sent2: If you overbake the cake, it will become dry and crumbly.
meanings.sent3: The chef accidentally overbakes the bread, turning it into a rock.
meanings.sent4: She overbakes her muffins until they resemble hockey pucks.
meanings.sent5: Be careful not to overbake the pie, or it will burn and be inedible.

meanings.definition: Baked too long or too much.
meanings.sent1: The overbakes cookies were too crunchy for my liking.
meanings.sent2: The overbakes bread had a burnt taste to it.
meanings.sent3: He served the overbakes pizza at the party, and no one enjoyed it.
meanings.sent4: The overbakes brownies were as hard as bricks.
meanings.sent5: The overbakes muffins crumbled into a mess when touched.
